alert.note: Alert for Craig; Delaware; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:25AM CDT until June 18 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Delaware County in northeastern Oklahoma... Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 124 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles south of Edna to near Ketchum, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Vinita... Commerce... Fairland... Afton... Quapaw... Welch... Bernice... Ketchum... Bluejacket... Wyandotte... Picher... Bernice State Park... Cleora... Narcissa... Ottawa... Peoria... Cardin... Hollow... Pyramid Corners... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 283 and 324. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
